titlestmt.titleproper: Nelson A. Rockefeller Vice Presidential records, Advance Office, Series 1
A Guide to the Nelson A. Rockefeller Vice Presidential records, Advance Office, Series 1 FA781

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2019-10-25 23:55:22 -0400.

did.unittitle: Nelson A. Rockefeller Vice Presidential records, Advance Office, Series 1

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: United States. Office of the Vice President.

physdesc.extent: 17 legal document boxes, 1 half legal document box.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Types of records include: correspondence, travel logs, brochures and pamphlets, photographs, newspaper articles, and guest lists.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: These records are in two subseries, 1-Events and 2-Vice Presidential Staff Correspondence.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for scholarly research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids
otherfindaid.p: Detailed finding aids for each series of this collection are available:

Nelson A. Rockefeller Vice Presidential Records, Working Papers of the Vice President (FA384)
Nelson A. Rockefeller Vice Presidential Records, Foreign Affairs and National Security (FA385)

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: RAC users must abide by all applicable provisions of U.S. copyright law. Reproduction/duplication of archival items is routinely provide in accordance with "fair use." If the RAC does not hold copyright for an archival collection or tems within a collection, it is the user's responsibility to contact the copyright holder, or make a fair effort to do so, prior to publication.

did.unittitle: Events

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Nelson A. Rockefeller's itinerary as Vice President of the United States during the years 1975-1976
